## isSome() function

Typeguard to check if a `Maybe` is `Some` value (not `None`<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isSome<T>(val: Maybe<T>): val is T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  val | [Maybe](./js-utils.maybe.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

val is T
